timeline.message:
I have no idea why i had to do this

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

Cypress sometimes matches the wrong request and fails.

Even though there are multiple requests it could match, and one of those request is the correct one.

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

Idk what that was supposed to do (1)

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

There will be no "per field" workarounds.

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

Idk what that was supposed to do (2)

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

There's no such thing as a non-editable list.

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

Reset list value just in case

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

Test works almost completely. Now its tobi's job to implement the proper business logic

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

Cannot type enter in a div. It must be a typeable element (like input)

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

How did this work before? It's search, not a list!

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

Use a 20ms delay when typing in `writeIntoStringField`

Some weird race condition is happening here.

For more details see: https://github.com/cypress-io/cypress/issues/3817

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6732

timeline.bodyText: I see it is used in the form several times used in matching the patch value.  So not sure if it's a good idea to remove it
